event.description: Alfonso Soriano called out on strikes.
Ryan Theriot strikes out swinging.
Kosuke Fukudome walks.
Milton Bradley grounds out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Micah Hoffpauir doubles (5) on a line drive to right fielder Corey Hart.
Geovany Soto singles on a ground ball to left fielder Ryan Braun, deflected by third baseman Craig Counsell. Micah Hoffpauir to 3rd.
Mike Fontenot called out on strikes.
Bobby Scales strikes out swinging.
Ryan Dempster flies out to center fielder Chris Duffy.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
Ryan Theriot walks.
Kosuke Fukudome flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Milton Bradley walks. Ryan Theriot to 2nd.
Micah Hoffpauir flies out to center fielder Chris Duffy.
Geovany Soto called out on strikes.
Mike Fontenot doubles (4) on a ground ball to right fielder Corey Hart.
Bobby Scales pops out to third baseman Craig Counsell in foul territory.
Ryan Dempster walks.
Alfonso Soriano strikes out swinging.
Ryan Theriot grounds out, third baseman Craig Counsell to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Kosuke Fukudome lines out to shortstop J. Hardy.
Milton Bradley singles on a fly ball to right fielder Corey Hart.
Micah Hoffpauir homers (3) on a fly ball to right field. Milton Bradley scores.
Geovany Soto strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Seth McClung replaces Yovani Gallardo, batting 9th.
Mike Fontenot strikes out swinging, catcher Jason Kendall to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Bobby Scales flies out to right fielder Corey Hart.
Ryan Dempster called out on strikes.
Alfonso Soriano grounds out, third baseman Craig Counsell to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Ryan Theriot walks.
Kosuke Fukudome singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Corey Hart. Ryan Theriot to 3rd.
Milton Bradley walks. Kosuke Fukudome to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Mitch Stetter replaces Seth McClung, batting 9th.
Micah Hoffpauir strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Carlos Villanueva replaces Mitch Stetter, batting 9th.
Geovany Soto grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Craig Counsell. Kosuke Fukudome out at 3rd.
Pitching Change: Jorge Julio replaces Carlos Villanueva, batting 9th, replacing Brad Nelson.
Mike Fontenot walks.
Bobby Scales strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Aaron Miles replaces David Patton.
Aaron Miles grounds into a force out, second baseman Rickie Weeks to shortstop J. Hardy. Mike Fontenot out at 2nd. Aaron Miles to 1st.
Alfonso Soriano singles on a soft fly ball to left fielder Ryan Braun. Aaron Miles to 3rd.
Ryan Theriot hit by pitch. Alfonso Soriano to 2nd.
With Kosuke Fukudome batting, wild pitch by Jorge Julio, Aaron Miles scores. Alfonso Soriano to 3rd. Ryan Theriot to 2nd.
Kosuke Fukudome doubles (7) on a fly ball to center fielder Chris Duffy. Alfonso Soriano scores. Ryan Theriot scores.
Pitching Change: Todd Coffey replaces Jorge Julio, batting 9th.
Milton Bradley doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Chris Duffy. Kosuke Fukudome scores.
Micah Hoffpauir strikes out swinging, catcher Jason Kendall to first baseman Prince Fielder.
Geovany Soto singles on a line drive to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Mike Fontenot grounds into a double play, second baseman Rickie Weeks to shortstop J. Hardy to first baseman Prince Fielder. Geovany Soto out at 2nd.
Bobby Scales singles on a line drive to center fielder Chris Duffy.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Reed Johnson replaces Aaron Heilman.
Reed Johnson lines out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Rickie Weeks strikes out swinging.
Craig Counsell singles on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano.
Ryan Braun doubles (6) on a line drive to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. Craig Counsell scores.
With Prince Fielder batting, Ryan Braun steals (3) 3rd base, Ryan Braun scores. Throwing error by catcher Geovany Soto.
Prince Fielder strikes out swinging, catcher Geovany Soto to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
J. Hardy strikes out swinging.
Corey Hart called out on strikes.
Chris Duffy grounds out, pitcher Ryan Dempster to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Jason Kendall strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Ryan Dempster. Jason Kendall to 1st.
Yovani Gallardo strikes out swinging.
Rickie Weeks singles on a ground ball to shortstop Ryan Theriot.
Craig Counsell walks. Rickie Weeks to 2nd.
Ryan Braun walks. Rickie Weeks to 3rd. Craig Counsell to 2nd.
Prince Fielder out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome. Rickie Weeks scores.
J. Hardy pops out to catcher Geovany Soto in foul territory.
Corey Hart grounds out, pitcher Ryan Dempster to second baseman Mike Fontenot to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Chris Duffy strikes out swinging.
Jason Kendall singles on a ground ball to pitcher Ryan Dempster. Jason Kendall advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by pitcher Ryan Dempster.
Yovani Gallardo lines out to shortstop Ryan Theriot.
Rickie Weeks walks.

With Prince Fielder batting, Ryan Braun caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Geovany Soto to shortstop Ryan Theriot.

Ryan Braun homers (8) on a fly ball to left field.

Prince Fielder walks.

Pitching Change: David Patton replaces Neal Cotts, batting 9th.
Corey Hart singles on a ground ball to center fielder Kosuke Fukudome. Prince Fielder scores. J. Hardy to 2nd.
Chris Duffy grounds into a force out, first baseman Micah Hoffpauir to shortstop Ryan Theriot. J. Hardy to 3rd. Corey Hart out at 2nd. Chris Duffy to 1st.
Jason Kendall singles on a fly ball to left fielder Alfonso Soriano. J. Hardy scores. Chris Duffy to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brad Nelson replaces Carlos Villanueva.
Brad Nelson walks. Chris Duffy to 3rd. Jason Kendall to 2nd.

Craig Counsell grounds out, third baseman Bobby Scales to first baseman Micah Hoffpauir.
Pitching Change: Chad Fox replaces David Patton, batting 9th, replacing Aaron Miles.
Ryan Braun walks.
With Prince Fielder batting, wild pitch by Chad Fox, Ryan Braun to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Aaron Heilman replaces Chad Fox, batting 9th.
Prince Fielder walks.
J. Hardy walks. Ryan Braun to 3rd. Prince Fielder to 2nd.
Corey Hart walks. Ryan Braun scores. Prince Fielder to 3rd. J. Hardy to 2nd.

Jason Kendall out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Milton Bradley. J. Hardy scores. Corey Hart to 3rd.
